content: {"locationId": "5194", "organizationId": "4368", "name": "One Roof Ecumenical Alliance Outreach, Inc.", "address1": "255 Temple Ave", "address2": "", "city": "Newnan", "state": "GA", "zipCode": "30263", "country": null, "phone": "770-683-7705", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "33.38784", "longitude": "-84.82055", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Coweta", "languages": "English", "features": "Parking Available", "aboutUs": "Our Site: We are located in the shopping center next to Crook's on Temple Avenue. There are three buildings we work out of, the administrative office, the food pantry, and the thrift store.     Our Mission: We are people serving the Lord, working with families in crisis in Coweta County, offering food, clothing, and financial assistance.? It is our vision to make a positive impact on the quality of life for Coweta residents.", "notes": "We are closed for all federal holidays. If there are any exceptions we will post them on our website or social media pages.     We do not have an indoor waiting space so please be aware that you will be asked to wait in our number queue outside of the office doors. Additionally, our food pantry staff prepacks the boxes and kits so you will be given a fair mix of items. If you have any  food allergies  we will do our best to accommodate you. This does  not  apply to food preferences, only  allergies .", "contactName": "One Roof Outreach", "contactPhone": "770-683-7705", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "Financial Assistance, Thrift Store", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags", "dietRestrictions": "Other", "foodOfferings": "Diapers, Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Pet Food / Supplies, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 42, "regionName": "Atlanta Community Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "17b4255f-0222-445e-984f-653525137fd3.png", "website": "https://www.acfb.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Monday 10:00 AM-5:00 PM (Donation Drop Off ends at 4:00 pm)", "Monday 1:00 PM-4:00 PM", "Monday 1:00 PM-4:00 PM", "Tuesday 10:00 AM-5:00 PM (Donation Drop Off ends at 4:00 pm)", "Wednesday 10:00 AM-5:00 PM (Donation Drop Off ends at 4:00 pm)", "Wednesday 1:00 PM-4:00 PM", "Wednesday 1:00 PM-4:00 PM", "Thursday 10:00 AM-5:00 PM (Donation Drop Off ends at 4:00 pm)", "Friday 10:00 AM-5:00 PM (Donation Drop Off ends at 4:00 pm)", "Friday 1:00 PM-4:00 PM", "Friday 1:00 PM-4:00 PM", "Saturday 10:00 AM-5:00 PM (Donation Drop Off ends at 4:00 pm)"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
